attributes.action: Call upon HM Government to implement the dissolution of the Scottish parliament.
attributes.background: Call upon HM Government to implement the dissolution of the Scottish parliament. On the grounds that it is meddling in the affairs of the United Kingdom governance, in opposing the leaving of the European Union, as decided by the people of the United Kingdom by referendum on the 23rd June 2016

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/123452
